title.rendered: NRE Sweden’s sale of large property development project in Täby

content.rendered:
NRE Sweden AB is now commencing the construction of 99 owner-occupied apartments in Hägerneholm, next to Arninge in Täby. The total area is approximately 5,500 square metres GFA.

The project is built for Rimbo Hus AB, which has entered into an agreement with NRE Sweden AB for acquisition of the project. The new property consists of two residential buildings of 5 and 6 floors. NRE Sweden AB is responsible contractor and the project is expected to be completed by the end of 2019.

NRE Group A/S was founded in 2010 and is active in Scandinavia. NRE provides turnkey real estate projects. NRE Sweden AB was advised by Mannheimer Swartling in the transaction.
